meanings.sent1: The apple with the pipiest flesh was juicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the fruits, the orange was the pipiest.
meanings.sent3: The pipiest grape in the bunch made everyone smile with its burst of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the pipiest song, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The pipiest flower in the garden attracted the most bees with its nectar.

meanings.sent1: The pipiest kitten in the litter was always full of energy.
meanings.sent2: Among all the puppies, the golden retriever was the pipiest.
meanings.sent3: His jokes were the pipiest, always making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The pipiest smile on her face brightened up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The pipiest child in the class was known for their contagious laughter.
